lines.text:
[finding out champagne is made from grapes]
It's not very purple, is it?
I'd do anything for you. I'll write notes for you, I'll defraud managers for you, I'll steal babies for you. I'll do anything for you, but I won't marry you.
I'm going to operate, and for the first time in my life I hope the patient dies on the table.
Don't you worry one moment about that bouncing boy. He'll grow up to be President one of these day.
